pullrequest.title: Proposal: scoping rules, allow everything to use //pose[@relative_to]

content.raw: Given the other discussion about simplified scope, perhaps we want to validate this current proposal by stating that it is the most conservative, and will allow for other more expansive \(but possibly more complex\) scoping rules to come into play while maintain compatibility?
content.html: Given the other discussion about simplified scope, perhaps we want to validate this current proposal by stating that it is the most conservative, and will allow for other more expansive (but possibly more complex) scoping rules to come into play while maintain compatibility?
